commentBody: We shall see and I hope the Chinese consumer is learning. But in 38 years of trademark law, the Chinese Govt. has passed laws, promised to enforce intellectual property rights and yet they still flourish and, in many cases, the government owns the factories. In short, the government has been behind counterfeiting and knockoffs for 40 years. US companies made a deal with the devil getting cheap labor and spending millions trying to combat counterfeits has been part of that deal.
